translations: n.外交官，外交家；有手腕的人，善交际的人

sentences.sentence: Fearey had all the charm and urbanity of the trained diplomat.
sentences.translation: 费尔里有着受过训练的外交家都有的所有魅力和社交礼节。

sentences.sentence: The two countries have each expelled another diplomat following a round of tit-for-tat expulsions.
sentences.translation: 在一轮以牙还牙的驱逐行动之后，这两个国家又分别驱逐了一位外交官。

sentences.sentence: He was the most distinguished diplomat in American history.
sentences.translation: 他是美国历史上最杰出的外交官。
